text: The White House Press Secretary is a job at the White House. Press secretaries act as the primary spokesperson for the United States Government and the President, senior executives, and policies. Karoline Leavitt is the current White House Press Secretary. ==List of Press Secretaries== Year(s) Press Secretary President 1929–1931 George Edward Akerson Herbert Hoover 1931–1933 Theodore Goldsmith Joslin Herbert Hoover 1933–1945 Stephen Early Franklin Delano Roosevelt 1945 Jonathan W. Daniels Harry S. Truman 1945–1950 Charlie Ross Harry S. Truman 1950 Stephen Early Harry S. Truman 1950–1952 Joseph Short Harry S. Truman 1952–1953 Roger Tubby Harry S. Bush 2009–2011 Robert Gibbs Barack Obama 2011–2014 Jay Carney Barack Obama 2014–2017 Josh Earnest Barack Obama 2017 Sean Spicer Donald Trump 2017–2019 Sarah Sanders Donald Trump 2019–2020 Stephanie Grisham Donald Trump 2020–2021 Kayleigh McEnany Donald Trump 2021–2022 Jen Psaki Joe Biden 2022–2025 Karine Jean-Pierre Joe Biden 2025–present Karoline Leavitt Donald Trump :1 Did not brief the press after being wounded in the Reagan assassination attempt. :2 De facto Press Secretary (as White House Deputy Press Secretary). :3 Did not brief the press while Stephanopoulos was Communications Director.
